column4: I'm looking for a comic book reader like cdisplay, do you know one?
if you search sourceforge for "comic book archive", you'll get a lot of choices
really? you found on in the repos?
anyway, sourceforge has all kinds of cbr, cbz and cbt viewers
yeah, but I didnt want to install by a tar ball...
installing from source is not that diffecult, and allows you (in some cases) to custom make your program
none of the comic viewers are hard to compile at all
I know, but what about the dependencies?
use "checkinstall" instead of "make install" and you'll be doin yourself a favor
comix.sourceforge.net depends on gtk, pygtk and some other simple thing (that i think is already on your box)
why I cant extract the rar comic file?
I installed comix, but can't make it work..
